author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: You can see some examples on how to call the Withdrawals contract in this test: https://github.com/lightclient/sys-asm/blob/main/test/Withdrawal.t.sol.in#L36-L62

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
<@811686524218900501> the input data has the following format:
```
  ;;  +--------+--------+
  ;;  | pubkey | amount |
  ;;  +--------+--------+
  ;;      48       8
```
As long as amount > 0 it will be a partial withdrawal.
